testcase.name: Invalid user logs in
testcase.system-out: Given the user enters username "wrong" and password "wrong".................passed When the user logs in.......................................................passed Then the user should not be logged in.......................................passed

testcase.name: Valid user logs in
testcase.system-out: Given the user enters username "demouser" and password "testingisfun99".....passed When the user logs in.......................................................passed Then the user should be logged in successfully..............................passed
